Name: Gallicus
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Wine glass .
Prepare garnish of 3 skewered Fragata Green Olives .
Review: Rosolio di Bergamotto adds bittersweet, zesty citrus complexity to this light prosecco-charged aperitivo.
History: One of the serves promoted with the launch of Italicus Rosolio di Bergamotto in the summer of 2017.
